mapper.insert: insert into print_template( id, org_code, create_date, modify_date, type, name, printer, backgroundImage, height, width, note, data ) values ( #{id}, #{orgCode}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{type}, #{name}, #{printer}, #{backgroundImage}, #{height}, #{width}, #{note}, #{data} )
mapper.update:
update print_template set
id=#{id},
org_code=#{orgCode},
create_date=#{createDate},
modify_date=#{modifyDate},
type=#{type},
name=#{name},
printer=#{printer},
backgroundImage=#{backgroundImage},
height=#{height},
width=#{width},
note=#{note},
data=#{data}
